!** minipage
.
iono en oie noien oien oien oien bottom \fbox{\begin{minipage}[b]{3cm}
		content... more text more text
\end{minipage}} and some text after the minipage and some text after the minipage

iono en oie noien oien oien oien top \fbox{\begin{minipage}[t]{3cm}
		content... more text more text
\end{minipage}} and some text after the minipage and some text after the minipage


iono en oie noien oien oien oien oein \fbox{\begin{minipage}[b][2cm]{3cm}
	content... more text more text more text more text more text
\end{minipage}} and some text after the minipage

iono en oie noien oien oien oien i top \fbox{\begin{minipage}[b][2cm][t]{3cm}
		content... more text more text
\end{minipage}} and some text after the minipage and some text after the minipage

iono en oie noien oien oien oien i stretch \fbox{\begin{minipage}[b][2cm][s]{3cm}
		content... more text more text
\end{minipage}} and some text after the minipage and some text after the minipage

iono en oie noien oien oien oien top i bottom \fbox{\begin{minipage}[t][2cm][b]{3cm}
		content... more text more text
\end{minipage}} and some text after the minipage and some text after the minipage

iono en oie noien oien oien oien top i top \fbox{\begin{minipage}[t][2cm][t]{3cm}
		content... more text more text
\end{minipage}} and some text after the minipage and some text after the minipage
.


s** parbox - simple alignment
.
\noindent
Some text
\fbox{\parbox{2cm}{parbox default alignment, parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[t]{2cm}{parbox top alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[b]{2cm}{parbox bottom alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text.
.


s** parbox - alignment with a given height
.
\noindent
Some text
\fbox{\parbox[c][3cm]{2cm}{parbox default alignment, parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[t][3cm]{2cm}{parbox top alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[b][3cm]{2cm}{parbox bottom alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text.
.


s** parbox - all explicit pos and inner-pos combinations
.
\noindent
The following examples demonstrate all explicit \emph{pos}/\emph{inner-pos} combinations:
\begin{itemize}
\item center alignment:

\noindent
Some text
\fbox{\parbox[c][3cm][t]{2cm}{parbox default alignment, parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[c][3cm][c]{2cm}{parbox top alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[c][3cm][b]{2cm}{parbox bottom alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text.

\item top alignment:

\noindent
Some text
\fbox{\parbox[t][3cm][t]{2cm}{parbox default alignment, parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[t][3cm][c]{2cm}{parbox top alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[t][3cm][b]{2cm}{parbox bottom alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text.

\item bottom alignment:

\noindent
Some text
\fbox{\parbox[b][3cm][t]{2cm}{parbox default alignment, parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[b][3cm][c]{2cm}{parbox top alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[b][3cm][b]{2cm}{parbox bottom alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text.
\end{itemize}
.


s** parbox - top and bottom alignment in the same line
.
\noindent
Some text
\fbox{\parbox[b][3cm][t]{2cm}{parbox default alignment, parbox test text}}
some text
\fbox{\parbox[t][3cm][c]{2cm}{parbox top alignment, text parbox test text}}
some text.
.
